title: 6 Natural Fertilizers to Improve Garden Soil
itunes:title: 6 Natural Fertilizers to Improve Garden Soil
description: 6 natural ways to test and fertilize your garden soil now, so it's in the best shape it can be for healthier plants and larger harvests. What you need to know about soil amendments and which is best for your soil.
content:encoded: 6 natural ways to test and fertilize your garden soil now, so it's in the best shape it can be for healthier plants and larger harvests. What you need to know about soil amendments and which is best for your soil.
itunes:subtitle: Increase Your Harvest by Increasing Soil Health
author: melissa@melissaknorris.com (Melissa K. Norris 5th Generation Homesteader)
